writeups.description: Advanced ARM64 exploitation techniques using Return-Oriented Programming to bypass modern mitigations.

writeups.description: Demonstrating data poisoning techniques against machine learning models in production environments.

writeups.description: Exploiting reentrancy vulnerabilities in Ethereum smart contracts to drain funds.

writeups.description: Bypassing certificate pinning in Android applications using Frida framework for API analysis.

writeups.description: Breaking weak RSA implementations using factorization techniques and common modulus attacks.

writeups.description: Attacking Industrial Control Systems through Modbus protocol vulnerabilities.

writeups.title: Advanced OSINT: Digital Footprinting
writeups.description: Comprehensive OSINT techniques for gathering intelligence from social media and public sources.

writeups.description: Chaining XML External Entity injection with Server-Side Request Forgery for cloud metadata extraction.

writeups.title: Reverse Engineering Go Binaries
writeups.description: Advanced techniques for reversing stripped Go binaries and recovering function names.

writeups.title: Dynamic Programming in CTF
writeups.description: Solving complex algorithmic challenges using dynamic programming techniques.

writeups.description: Introduction to Linux kernel exploitation techniques including privilege escalation via kernel vulnerabilities.

writeups.description: Using voltage glitching attacks to bypass secure boot on ARM microcontrollers.
